name: PHP Bitcoin Price
tagline: PHP site that shows the latest Bitcoin prices.
body:
Bitcoin Price
=============

***

Simple PHP site that shows the latest Bitcoin prices. Just one file.

It accesses the Bitstamp JSON and then copies it to the server, so that we don't hit the request limit imposed by Bitstamp.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
